title: Strengthening System Design Practical Competencies: Improving Critical Thinking and Clinical Judgment for Healthcare Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Knowledge and Three or More Years of Clinical Experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply critical thinking in real clinical scenarios to develop three or more alternative diagnostic plans
Learners reduce clinical judgment errors by 20% or more through standardized patient case analysis
Learners can explain project-specific decision-making processes with over 80% clarity based on peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
